fleximageadmin: The name of the Administrator page
fleximage_upldefimg_ok: Success message when the images are uploaded when opening the Administrator page
fleximage_upldefimg_nok: Failure  message when the images are uploaded when opening the Administrator page
fleximage_upldefimg_noresponce: No responce from the shell command. Most likely the '''php BIN executable''' $wf_QBox_PHP_Bin location is set wrong
